Husband vs Wife (Well Done AC Milan 2 - Liverpool 1)

TO MY DEAR WIFE:
During the past year I have tried to make love to you 365 times.
I have succeeded 36 times, which is an average of once every ten days.
The following is a list of why I did not succeed more often:
54 times the sheets were clean
17 times it was too late
49 times you were too tired
20 times it was too hot
15 times you pretended to be sleep
22 times you had a headache
17 times you were afraid of waking the baby
16 times you said you were too sore
12 times it was the wrong time of the month
19 times you had to get up early
9 times you said weren't in the mood
7 times you were sunburned
6 times you were watching the late show
5 times you didn't want to mess up your new hairdo
3 times you said the neighbors would hear us
9 times you said your mother would hear us

Of the 36 times I did succeed, the activity was not satisfactory because:

6 times you just lay there
8 times you reminded me there's a crack in the ceiling
4 times you told me to hurry up and get it over with
7 times I had to wake you and tell you I finished
1 time I was afraid I had hurt you because I felt you move

KEEP READING.......

=====================================================
TO MY DEAR HUSBAND:
I think you have things a little confused. Here are the reasons you didn't get more than you did:
5 times you came home drunk and tried to screw the cat
36 times you did not come home at all
21 times you didn't cum
33 times you came too soon
19 times you went soft before you got in
38 times you worked too late
10 times you got cramps in your toes
29 times you had to get up early to play golf
2 times you were in a fight and someone kicked you in the balls
4 times you got it stuck in your zipper
3 times you had a cold and your nose was running
2 times you had a splinter in your finger
20 times you lost the notion after thinking about it all day
6 times you came in your pajamas while reading a dirty book
98 times you were too busy watching TV
Of the times we did get together:
The reason I laid still was because you missed and were screwing the sheets.
I wasn't talking about the crack in the ceiling, what I said was, "Would you prefer me on my back or kneeling?"
The time you felt me move was because you farted and I was trying to breathe.
==============================
Talk about statistics...!

Zero sum game?

Is life a zero sum game? Have u heard people said that life has its ups and downs, or life is a cycle, or even, like a fren quotes, "wat goes around, comes around. karma do exist"...again, is life a zero sum game? why? is it a fight between good and evil? rich and poor? does this word "balance" plays an important role? so many questions....

why then we exist in this world? to play this zero sum game?

Just 4 fun...

The Penis Study....

The American Government funded a study to see why the head of a man's penis was larger than the shaft. After 1 year and $180,000, they concluded that the reason that the head was larger than the shaft was to give the man more pleasure during sex.

After the US published the study, the French decided to do their own study. After $250,000 and 3 years of research, they concluded that the reason the head was larger than the shaft was to give the woman more pleasure during sex.

Canadians, unsatisfied with these findings, conducted their own study. After 2 weeks and a cost of around $75.46, and 2 cases of beer, they concluded that it was to keep a man's hand from flying off and hitting himself in the forehead.

This is a very good article.

Those who are still single may learn something from here. Those who are already married may take it as a guideline to improve your marriage....

DID I MARRY THE RIGHT PERSON?
During one of the seminars, a woman asked a common question.
She said, "How do I know if I married the right person?"
I noticed that there was a large man sitting next to her so I said, "It depends. Is that your husband?"
In all seriousness, she answered "How do you know?"

Let me answer this question because the chances are good that it's weighing on your mind.

Here's the answer.
EVERY relationship has a cycle. In the beginning, you fell in love with your spouse.
You anticipated their call, wanted their touch, and liked their idiosyncrasies.

Falling in love with your spouse wasn't hard.
In fact, it was a completely natural and spontaneous experience. You didn't have to DO anything. That's why it's called "falling" in love...Because it's happening TO YOU.

People in love sometimes say, "I was swept of my feet." Think about the imagery of that expression. It implies that you were just standing there; doing nothing, and then
something came along and happened TO YOU.

Falling is love is easy. It's a passive and spontaneous experience. But after a few years of marriage, the euphoria of love fades.

It's the natural cycle of EVERY relationship.
Slowly but surely, phone calls become a bother (if they come at all), touch is not always welcome (when it happens), and your spouse's
idiosyncrasies, instead of being cute, drive you
nuts.

The symptoms of this stage vary with every
relationship, but if you think about your marriage, you will notice a dramatic difference between the initial stage when you were in love and a much duller or even angry subsequent stage.

At this point, you and/or your spouse might start asking, "Did I marry the right person?"
And as you and your spouse reflect on the euphoria of the love you once had, you may begin to desire That experience with someone else. This is when marriages breakdown.
People blame their spouse for their unhappiness and look outside their marriage for fulfillment.

Extramarital fulfillment comes in all shapes and
sizes. Infidelity is the most obvious. But sometimes people turn to work, a hobby, a
friendship, excessive TV, or abusive substances.

But the answer to this dilemma does NOT lie outside your marriage. It lies within it. I'm not saying that you couldn't fall in love with
someone else. You could. And TEMPORARILY you'd feel better. But you'd be in the same situation a few years later. Because (listen carefully to this):
THE KEY TO SUCCEEDING IN MARRIAGE IS NOT FINDING THE RIGHT PERSON; IT'S LEARNING TO LOVE THE PERSON YOU FOUND. SUSTAINING love is not a passive or spontaneous experience.

It'll NEVER just happen to you. You can't "find" LASTING love. You have to "make" it day in and day out. That's why we have the expression "the labor of love." Because it takes time, effort, and energy. And most importantly, it takes WISDOM. You have to know WHAT TO DO to make your marriage work. Make no mistake about it. Love is NOT a mystery.
There are specific things you can do (with or
without your spouse) to succeed with your marriage. Just as there are physical laws of the universe (such as gravity), there are also laws for relationships. Just as the right diet and exercise program makes you physically stronger, certain habits in your relationship WILL make your marriage stronger. It's a direct cause and effect.

If you know and apply the laws, the results are
predictable. ..you can "make" love. Love in marriage is indeed a "decision".. .Not just a feeling.

Monday Laughs

Ader gak lowya yg cam ni.....

ATTORNEY: Doctor, before you performed the autopsy, did you check for a pulse?

WITNESS: No.

ATTORNEY: Did you check for blood pressure?

WITNESS: No.

ATTORNEY: Did you check for breathing?

WITNESS: No.

ATTORNEY: So, then it is possible that the patient was alive when you began the autopsy?

WITNESS: No.

ATTORNEY: How can you be so sure, Doctor?

WITNESS: Because his brain was sitting on my desk in a jar.

ATTORNEY: But could the patient have still been alive, nevertheless?

WITNESS: Yes, it is possible that he could have been alive and practicing law.

Check ur blood condition....

Live Blood Analysis

It is the process of using a microscope to evaluate shape and the properties of individual blood cells. Using this process, properly trained health professionals have been able to observe some startling nutritional disorders. These disorders include some conditions that cannot easily be found by using the traditional methods of blood analysis.

By observing various conditions in a sample of blood, the health professional is able to customize a nutritional program specifically geared for the individual needs of the patient. This method was designed as a screening test to take the guess work out of selecting the appropriate nutritional program for the individual client.

The advantage of the blood microscopy analysis is that many nutritional disorders can be detected before standard blood tests can detect any chemical changes. Generally then, treatment can be more successful because these problems are discovered when they are still in their infant stages. This would be considered true preventive care nutrition.

Normal blood is characterized by cells that are approximately the same size and do not stick to each other or clump. During a blood analysis, your blood is viewed on a television monitor.

Rouleau is one of the most common conditions seen in blood. The main effect of rouleau causes the red blood cells to stick together. For optimum function, red blood cells must be separate. If they stick to each other, their surface area is greatly reduced and the transport of oxygen is drastically impaired.

By using live blood analysis, we are able to see what's going on in the bloodstream and we can make subclinical observations about your nutritional health.

Fortunately, Rouleau and the more than 25 other conditions seen using live blood analysis can often be improved or corrected through supplementation, dietary or lifestyle changes.

Go to www.microtechpro.com/.../livebloodanalysis.htm for more information.

Sebab you spent money unnecessarily
You know it is taxpayers' money
So please spend the money wisely.

Ihsan dari King Tapir (2007)

11 FREE WAYS TO SAVE MONEY ON PETROL

100 Miles To To The Gallon!

From cheapest to most expensive how you can save money on petrol:

1. Put air in your tires to your car specifications, eighty percent of the tires on cars are low on air and that costs you 1 to (ready for this) 5 miles per gallon!

2. Go lightly on the gas pedal = save gas. That means slow down. The faster you go, the more air drag you create. This burns that expensive petrol! That 55 mph may drive you nuts, but it saves gas.

3. Try not to stop... to save petrol! Huh, you say? Here it is, slow down and look for space in traffic so that you can time the stop lights... so you don’t have to stop at them. Make it a game! Getting all that steel around you moving, costs the big bucks in petrol! If you have to stop, start out gently – jack rabbit starts bust the petrol budget!

4. Take the junk out of your trunk! Every 200 lbs in your car costs you a mile per gallon of petrol. If you are in a car pool have every one that rides in your car go on a diet, to save gasoline.

5. Use your cruise control (if you have it) any time you can. Cruise control is better than your brain to help you maintain constant speed. Constant speed (see #3), at a conservative rate, will save you more petrol.

6. Don’t use the drive through at McDonald’s! Save petrol! Quickly park your car and walk inside, not only does that save petrol, but helps your heart! Stop driving around to look for the closest parking place at Walmart, park quickly and walk fast!

7. This one is more for men. If you get lost ask for directions. I don’t, and I waste petrol driving around because I know I will find where I am. Women ask directions, that’s why there’s one on every space shuttle. It improves space shuttle fuel mileage!

8. Sell your neighbors on MLM so they can work at home like you do. You? Avoid traffic jams by never leaving the driveway during rush hour. If you should accidentally get caught in a traffic jam, turn off your car to save petrol... Make sure you have a good battery before you do it too often.

9. When you get an oil change, use synthetic oil. The petrol savings will pay for the oil or a little more, and it will dramatically reduce your engine wear = save money!

10. Don’t want to get an engine tune up to save petrol? At least check the air filter for the engine! Usually air filters get dirty before you need a tune up and this costs you petrol.

11. No, don’t rush out and buy a hybrid electric car. The cost of operation isn’t worth the petrol savings and those big batteries make them a lead sled! Wait a few years!

Tips by Rod Cook (MLMwatchdog.com)

BPL KICK-OFF 11 AUG 2007

Let's start with some predictions...

Champion: MUFC (Again!!!!)

Close Challengers: 1 Liv 2 Che 3 Tot 4 Ars

Relegated: 18 Ful 19 Wig 20 Der

1st GAME
MUFC 3 READING 0

What a bad week...damn!

So frustrated ....

MU controlled the game, yet can't score...n now rooney is out.....well, maybe it is Tevez time!!

so, next game then...

POMPEY 1 DEVILS 3 ......

Life is tough, esp when things are not going ur way....

Is LIFE really tough?

Note
1 If u r a bizman, start Chapter 1.
2 If u r a staff, start Chapter 2.

Chapter 1 of LIFE, when biz is tough.....
1 Competitors try to steal your clients
2 Your staff start to look for greener pastures
3 You spend more money on marketing and promotion to revive your biz
4 Capital soon dries up and you fail to make monthly ends meet....i.e. NO MONEY!

Chapter 2 of LIFE, when biz hv no money.....
0 You will not get your salary
1 Your friends shy away from you
2 You can't apply any loans coz banks only give loans to people with money
3 Sooner or later, you can't make ends meet
4 After a while, you'll be blacklisted
5 Now you borrow from Ah Long....coz only they believe in you
6 Soon, you'll lose ur identity coz now u are running away from Ah Long
7 Next, you relocate and start a new identity in Felda

Chapter 3 of LIFE.....fictitous!
1 Felda will be listed on Bursa Malaysia
2 You get an allocation of Felda shares
3 The share price shoot up after two months
4 You now have money!!!....and banks come chasing after you to give their money
5 You are officially becoming more eligible and handsome
6 You should have more friends now
7 You can start to clear your name from CTOS, pay off Ah Long, get married etc
8 Start a new biz if you want to
9 Start a charity and earn a "Datuk" title

The moral of the story...
1 Don't get into biz
2 Don't borrow money from banks (coz they sucks!)
3 Make Ah Long your friends
4 Ignore your other friends
5 Send resume/cv to Felda

And just like NameWee (negarakuku).....Pls don't sue me coz i don't have money!!!!!

And if you are Banks, I M SORRY, I HAVE NO INTENTION TO HATE YOU!!! (I apologize just like NameWee)

Your Zodiacs...Your Traits!

JUST FOR FUN!

Below are generally true descriptions of zodiac signs, with traits from a book written 35 years ago by an astrologist predictions. Read your sign, then forward it on, with your zodiac sign and label on the subject line.

Better still...tell me who you are and rate the accuracy of your descriptions....thanks!

Let me start the ball rolling...
Me, taurus......accuracy 80%!

GEMINI - Irresistible

Nice. Love is one of a kind. Great listeners Very Good in the you know where... Lover not a fighter, but will still knock you out. Trustworthy. Always happy. Loud. Talkative. Outgoing VERY FORGIVING. Loves to make out. Has a beautiful smile. Generous. Strong. THE MOST IRRESISTIBLE.

VIRGO - The One that Waits

Dominant in relationships. Someone loves them right now. Always wants the last word. Caring. Smart. Loud. Loyal. Easy to talk to. Everything you ever wanted. Easy to please. The one and only.

SCORPIO - The Addict

EXTREMELY adorable. Intelligent. Loves to joke. Very Good sense of humor. Energetic. Predict future. GREAT kisser. Always get what they want. Attractive. Easy going. Loves being in long relationships. Talkative. Romantic. Caring.

LIBRA - The Lame One

Nice to everyone they meet. Their Love is one of a kind. Silly, fun and sweet. Have own unique appeal. Most caring person you will ever meet! however not the kind of person you wanna mess with ... u might end up crying...

ARIES - The Liar

Outgoing. Lovable. Spontaneous. Not one to mess with. Funny. Excellent kisser EXTREMELY adorable. Loves relationships, Addictive. Loud.

AQUARIUS - Does It In The Water

Trustworthy. Attractive. Great kisser. One of a kind. Loves being in long-term relationships. Extremely energetic. Unpredictable. Will exceed your expectations. Not a Fighter, But will Knock your lights out.

LEO - The Lion

Great talker. Attractive and passionate. Laid back. Knows how to have fun. Is really good at almost anything. Great kisser. Unpredictable. Outgoing. Down to earth. Addictive. Attractive. Loud. Loves being in long relationships. Talkative. Not one to mess with. Rare to find. Good when found.

CANCER - The Cutie

MOST AMAZING KISSER. Very high appeal. Love is one of a kind. Very romantic. Most caring person you will ever meet! Entirely creative. Extremely random and proud of it. Freak. Spontaneous. Great telling stories. Not a Fighter, But will Knock your lights out if it comes down to it. Someone you should hold on to.

PISCES - The Partner for Life

Caring and kind. Smart. Center of attention. High appeal. Has the last word. Good to find, hard to keep. Fun to be around.Extremely weird but in a good way. Good Sense of Humor!!! Thoughtful. Always gets what he or she wants. Loves to joke. Very popular. Silly, fun and sweet.

CAPRICORN - The Passionate Lover

Love to bust. Nice. Sassy. Intelligent. Sexy. Predict future. Irresistible. Loves being in long relationships. Great talker. Always gets what he or she wants. Cool. Loves to own Gemini's in sports. Extremely fun. Loves to joke. Smart.

TAURUS - The Tramp

Aggressive. Loves being in long relationships. Likes to give a good fight for what they want. Extremely outgoing. Loves to help people in times of need. Good kisser. Good personality. Stubborn. A caring person. One of a kind. Not one to mess with. Are the most attractive people on earth!

SAGITTARIUS - The Promiscuous One

Spontaneous. High appeal. Rare to find. Great when found. Loves being in long relationships. So much love to give. Not one to mess with. Very pretty. Very romantic. Nice to everyone They meet. Their Love is one of a kind. Silly, fun and sweet. Have own unique appeal. Most caring person you will ever meet! Amazing in the you know where..!!! Not the kind of person you wanna mess with- you might end up crying.

Invitation to all Barclays Premier League 07/08 Fans

Hi,

To all English Premier League fans, I'm inviting you guys to join my "Matrix Fantasy League" as part of the Nokia Football Crazy Manager 2007/08 which is starting from 15 Sep 2007.

A person can only create ONE team, otherwise you will be disqualified. What you have to do is to choose your best 11 for your fantasy team. You may also choose "lucky pick" if u r not familiar with the players. Currently, there are 10 Fantasy Teams in my league (Target 50-100 Teams).

Go to http://espnstar.fantasyleague.com/

Remember, to join you need to register using a valid email address and this pin number... 881....WELCOME ABOARD!

Thanks!

Dilemma...

QUESTION: Time for a change?

When u see the rich gets richer....

When more people care about themselves....

When average people struggle to make ends meet....

When well-off individuals get more government projects....

When basic necessities become more expensive to the majority....
.....and you are restricted to voice your opinion freely, as you have got no permit....

When there's a constant increase in unemployment/VSS....

When business people think about cost, and employ imported workforce....

When graduates works in industries not relevant to their qualifications....
....or even worse, fail to find employment

What I personally think is not important, but what do YOU think?

Please don't think this is POLITICAL....it is NOT....this is our life, and it affects your kids too....

This is reality, it is directly affecting each one of us and we need to do something about it....and what are we doing about it.....or you don't care?

LET'S BE MORE HUMANE & EXPECT A BETTER 2008 onwards.....

I LOVE MY COUNTRY & FELLOW MALAYSIANS....

THANK YOU FOR READING.....

Democracy: Proposal to the Malaysian Govt

The ISSUE
Public Rallies are considered nuisance to the Malaysian public

The NORMAL REACTION
Government/Police will not issue PERMITS to any form of public gatherings

The PROPOSAL
Issue permits (hence, allow democracy to exist) to only "controlable" (if there's such a word) rallies, i.e. gatherings in small numbers

For EXAMPLE
If the government feels that they can control a group of 100 people, then allow these 100 people to do a gathering (i.e. send memo to king, billion RM claim to the british government, etc). If these 100 people become violent, then the government can easily control them, hence NO big hu-ha, or "kacau-bilau", or nuisance, or destructions to public properties

The RESULT
MALAYSIA CAN STILL BE "SEEN" AS A DEMOCRATIC COUNTRY

Can, Pak Lah?

Note: Only one of your rakyat humble opinion.....TQ

Do you know that....

(1) u can help ur company save on monthly telephone bills, and at the same time, u also earn recurring income (for 24 months) while ur company pay the bills?

(2) u can save on ur monthly credit card bills by paying only 6-9% per year, instead of the 15-18%, and clears all ur outstanding amount (for later emergency use, may be)?

(3) u can enjoy 6-9% per year low interest rates in the form of zero installment plan from ur credit card, instead of making cash withdrawal that charges u 3% per withdrawal n u also has still to pay the 15-18% interest rates?

(4) If u think (1), (2) n (3) is shareable, why not also make extra income out of it?

Just sharing with u guys n gals a few innovative ways to save and earn some income that are currently available in the market, in case u r too busy blogging .

Send me a message, all queries will be strictly P&C.

Regards
